english.segment1: When you see the stars at night. Will you remember me. When you see the morning light. Will you remember me
english.segment2: For I spoke them into place. And they remember me. And I made you the same way. Will you remember me
english.segment4: For I spoke them into place. And they remember me. And I made you the same way. Will you remember me
english.segment6: Will you remember me. Will you remember me
english.segment7: When you see the stars at night. Will you remember me. When you see the morning light. Will you remember me
english.segment8: For I spoke them into place. And they remember me. And I made you the same way. Will you remember me. Will you remember me
